DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy safety co-administrated temisartan/amlodipine rosuvastatin subject dyslipidemia hypertension .
DOC.criteria: Dyslipidemia hypertesion msSBP < 180 mmHg msDBP < 110 mmHg LDLC ≤ 250 mg/dL Triglycerides < 400 mg/dL At Visit 3 , BP difference SBP ≥20mmHg DBP ≥10mmHg CK normal range ≥ 2 time Uncontrolled primary hypothyroidism ( TSH normal range ≥ 1.5 time ) AST ALT ≥ 2 time Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus ( HbA1c≥9 % ) CLcr < 30 mL/min/1.73m^2 K > 5.5 mEq/L Other exclusion apply
